title: Set alias for columns in dataset but old column names still appear in expression builder when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases set for the columns in the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new data source and dataset. 
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and try to select the dataset.
